sections.title: Riding the Rails: Mastering Public Transit on Super Bowl Sunday
key_points: Detail the VTA Light Rail and Caltrain routes serving Levi's Stadium.

stats_facts: Ride-sharing surge pricing can increase fares by 2x-5x during peak hours.

sections.transition: For those seeking a more structured and potentially cost-effective solution, shuttle services provide a valuable option.

stats_facts: The City of Santa Clara will be providing free shuttle services every 20 minutes from designated parking lots.
Shuttle routes connect to key transportation hubs and hotels throughout the city.
Shuttle services operate for approximately 3 hours before and after the game.
sections.transition: Finally, for the adventurous and physically fit, biking and walking offer unique ways to experience the Super Bowl atmosphere while bypassing traffic.
